title: Ep. 134 - Biggest Beneficiary of QE3: Gold
itunes:title: Biggest Beneficiary of QE3: Gold
description: Chris Mayer, editor of the Capital & Crisis newsletter, expects a bailout of the European banking system... Plus, China and the U.S. announcing their own stimulus plans in the months ahead. He says this may not have the "normal" positive reaction for stocks... But gold will soar.
